items.description: Value of the additional cost.

isSpecificAddressKnown.description: Indicates whether a specific address is known.

street.description: Street information, which can include 'street + number' or be used separately for street name.

number.description: Street number, used only in DE and AT, applicable in mid corp.

city.description: City where the location is situated.

state.description: State where the location is situated.

addressStatus.description: Status of the address: validated, not-validated, underwriter-validated.

value.description: the key in the mentioned notation

aggregateClaimsId.description: Local number, not a UUID (e.g., AC000001)

numberOfClaims.description: Number of claims, can be empty if unknown

currency.description: Currency used for the claim values

totalNetOfDeductibleLossPaidValue.description: Total net of deductible loss paid value

totalNetOfDeductibleLossOutstandingValue.description: Total net of deductible loss outstanding value

totalNetOfDeductibleLossIncurredValue.description: Total net of deductible loss incurred value

coverageGroup.description: Coverage group (e.g., CAT, MB, MLoP, other, total)

denialOfAccessRiskGrading.description: Risk grading for denial of access

currency.description: Currency in the 3 character format from ISO 4217

valuedWithDate.description: Start date of the amount stated - reason could be for a date in the future  e.g. linear indexation during policy period or adoptions based on reference data (e.g. Consumer Basket adoption during Renewal or MTA)

name.description: The actual answer to the question (the functional key).

label.description: The actual answer to the question (the human readable text).

AnyBuilding.title: AnyBuilding
AnyBuilding.description: Abstract Building to be covered within a location

AnyComplex.title: AnyComplex
AnyComplex.declaration: Abstract Complex to be covered within a location

AnyEntity.title: AnyEntity
AnyEntity.description: Object containing information about  any entity

label.description: Short human-readable description of AnyEntity

globalAnyEntityId.description: This is concatenated from anyEntityId and submissionRef and is globally unique.

country.description: ISO2 country code for country-based automatic location rules.

submissionRef.description: Reference to the submission for which these are created.

number.description: Added as per IE app implementation.

items.description: Policy, coverage, reinsurance, deductions.

settingDefaultLimitTo.description: Added as per IE app implementation.

items.description: Explicit list of Insurable Entities. JSON implementation is an array of strings holding the primary keys.

lastUpdatedBy.description: User who created or changed the entity information (e.g. Benzl)

lastUpdatedDate.description: Date and time of last change by user

AnyGroupOfLocations.title: AnyGroupOfLocations
AnyGroupOfLocations.description: Abstract group of locations e.g. within a contract

AnyItem.title: AnyItem
AnyItem.declaration: Abstract Item to be covered within a location

AnyLoB.title: AnyLoB
AnyLoB.description: The LoB constrcut associated than 1:1 to a policy wihtin CFM

AnyLocation.title: AnyLocation
AnyLocation.declaration: Abstract Item to be covered within a location

surveyDate.description: Date of the survey. Format - YYYY-MM-DD

riskQualityPD.description: Risk quality for Property Damage (good, above-standard, standard, sub-standard, poor)

riskQualityBI.description: Risk quality for Business Interruption (good, above-standard, standard, sub-standard, poor)

maximumForseeableLossPDValue.description: Maximum foreseeable loss value for Property Damage

maximumForseeableLossBIValue.description: Maximum foreseeable loss value for Business Interruption

estimatedMaximumLossPDValue.description: Estimated maximum loss value for Property Damage

estimatedMaximumLossBIValue.description: Estimated maximum loss value for Business Interruption

isARCAssessment.description: Indicates if ARC assessment is performed

totalSumInsuredEARValue.description: Total sum insured EAR (Erection All Risks) value

policy100PrGroundUpPMLValue.description: Policy 100% ground up Probable Maximum Loss value

Assessment.title: Assessment
Assessment.description: Parent for different evaluations Assessment is the common parent to identify which where relevant for a pricing result

policyId.description: Stores the rating relevant ID - in this case the Policy ID which equals the rating request torwards e.g. GCPA

assessmentType.description: what kind of assessment was done e.g. LCE

lastUpdatedDate.description: When the assessment was stored/ received

owningProcess.description: Process owning e.g. Underwriting might also be Claim Handling

isCurrent.description: Latest one is marked as relevant for e.g. pricing

lastUpdatedBy.description: User who last updated the entity

lastUpdatedDate.description: Date and time when the entity was last updated

Benefit.title: Benefit
Benefit.description: Object containing information about the benefit that would arise in case of damage, it would be relevant in case.

label.description: Short human-readable description of the benefit

items.description: Here the amount 'selected' during underwriting can be positioned in contrast to the one on the entity that 'represents real world'

biType.description: Giving what BI item it is based on defining configuration

BookingLine.title: BookingLine
BookingLine.description: Object containing information about the booking line

bookingGroupId.description: ID to identify all booking lines which belong to the same policy booking transaction

id.description: ID of the booking line bookingID in  handover purpose

entityId.description: Entity to which this booking needs to be reported, can be empty

bookingDirection.description: To specify if booking is forward or reverse

aggregationLevel.description: Detail or aggregated level of booking line

parentBookingId.description: BookingId of the booking line into which the current line is aggregated. It is empty for top-level aggregation (such as agg-level1)

minimumReportingPeriod.description: Indication of the reporting period to be applied, currently it's always the first day of the month

countryOfJurisdiction.description: Country of jurisdiction of the policy

bookingCode.description: Type of booking for premiums, commissions or fees/taxes

deductionCode.description: Type of deduction, for example lead-fee, or tax code from column header of FRED table or other

deductionPayableBy.description: Indication of the payer of the booking. Usually filled for fees, taxes or commissions

appliedPercentagePr.description: Percentage applied for tax or commission calculation

recipientPartyId.description: Reference to the broker, coinsurer or tax authority receiving the bookingLine

reportingSection.description: Section to which this booking needs to be reported

dueDate.description: Due date of the booking line

bookingValue.description: This is the value that will be recorded in the accounting system. It is expected to be rounded according to applicable rules

annualizedValue.description: Only used for technical calculations to control the rounding errors, not to be used in accounting

bookingPhase.description: 'expected', 'final' signaling expected of final premium booking

causationBookingId.description: the ID of the premium or other booking which caused this tax or comission booking

policyRef.description: legal policy on which these amounts shall be accounted

contractNumber.description: The part of the policy number not changing during an MTC, only changing with a renewal

contractVersion.description: The part of the policy number changing with an MTC

countryOfPolicyHolder.description: country of the legal policy holder, used in double taxation

deductionCase.description: tax case from row of FRED table or other

settlementAccountInfo.description: It can hold the information in compressed format like 'CC:DE0055_BC:DE55_CoC:I01_NC:AED01113_C:BMW32564'

state.description: State in country may be used for tax reason

municipality.description: Municipality in country may be used for tax reason

caseRef.description: Reference to the CFM case by name

coverageSequenceNr.description: PD-50048 for flexa PD, BI-50049 for flexa BI, etc. PD-50111, BI-50111 (Note: PD, BI are the reportingSection)

classificationCode.description: one or multiple classification codes can be necessary for reporting and analytics

lob.description: LOB for accounting, sublob can be expressed as lob/sublob

exposureValue.description: The decimal value according to the unit. In case of monetary value always in the same currency as bookingValue or annualizedValue

postingText.description: free form description of this transaction

Bucket.title: Bucket
Bucket.description: Object containing information about the bucket

type.description: Specifies the type of a Bucket based on defined values

valueType.description: Specififes the value of the indicated type

label.description: Short human-readable description of the bucket

maxAmount.description: Not used in MC but in accordance what we do - same object used in other positions

minAmount.description: Not used in MC but in accordance what we do - same object used in other positions

appliesToComponent.description: Few possible values are building, content, stocks [Defines to which component of the InsurableEntity the limit/Deductible applies to]

items.description: ( List<String>)

biRedundancy.description: Redundancy level for business interruption, e.g., 'Extensive'

Case.title: Case
Case.description: Object containing information about the case

id.description: Unique key of the operative case

label.description: Short human-readable description of the case label

type.description: Specifies the type of a Case based on defined values.

productComponentRef.description: Component sequence number for the product definition in PEX (interim solution which is LC conform)

priority.description: We would wanna use it for sort order?!

items.description: Events might have different Trigger

applicableToCaseSelection.description: Current Solution to be discussed with Joerg - Used in LC for exclusions

CaseSelectionName.description: Current Solution to be discussed with Joerg - Used in LC for exclusions

CaseSelectionLabel.description: Current Solution to be discussed with Joerg - Used in LC for exclusions

coverageApplicability.description: Current Solution to be discussed with Joerg - Used in LC for extensions

name.description: Name of the case selection (e.g., all-risk)

label.description: Label for the case selection

supplyChainExposureAndRiskQualityLabel.description: Label for supply chain exposure and risk quality

supplyChainExposureAndRiskQualityName.description: Name for supply chain exposure and risk quality

Claim.title: Claim
Claim.description: Object containing information about the claim

formallyRequestsCompensationForLossEvent.description: Connects a claim to a specific loss event that resulted in loss or damage.

processedAsClaimSection.description: Array of ClaimSection containing information related to the case reported by the claimant which has caused the loss and the damage details.

previousWorkflowProcessing.description: This keep a record of past workflow transactions.

actingAs.description: Role of the ClaimRecipient (e.g., client, broker, lead-carrier, cedant)

ClaimSection.title: ClaimSection
ClaimSection.description: Object containing information about the claim section

summary.description: Short description of the reasoning from claim handler.

coveringCaseFoundInPolicy.description: This indicates the policy in which the covered Case captured in a ClaimSection is detailed. This information is really useful in understanding the limits, deductibles etc defined in the policy for this particular Case

CoInsurancePanel.title: CoInsurancePanel
CoInsurancePanel.description: Object containing information about the coinsurance panel

CoInsuranceParticipation.title: CoInsuranceParticipation
CoInsuranceParticipation.description: Object containing information about the coinsurance participation

coInsuranceParticipationID.description: The unique ID of the individual Coinsurance participation

isLead.description: To specify if this participator of the coinsurance panel is in Lead position

isOurShare.description: To specify if this participator of the coinsurance panel is Allianz

sharePr.description: To specify the coinsurance share percentage Minimum 0, maximum 1.

thirdPartyPolicyRef.description: Provides information about the coinsurer's policyId in its policy system

leadFeePr.description: The percentage for the Lead Insurance fee to be paid by the participant

writtenByCoInsuranceCompanyRef.description: Reference to the Name of the CoInsurance Company. Target- a Party of role CoInsurer is referenced here

sharePr.description: Share percentage of the commercial interest

partyId.description: Identifier for the commercial interested party

draftPartyId.description: Draft identifier for the commercial interested party

sharePr.description: Percentage share allocation for the party

actingAs.description: Role of the CommissionRecipient (e.g., broker, lead-carrier, cedant)

id.description: Unique id of the Communication item.

channel.description: This indicates the different communication channels by which the claim was reported like Email, Phone, Post, Portal etc.

receivedOn.description: Indicates the date and time when the communication via the specified channel was received.

submissionId.description: Unique id of the respective Submission which is based on this Communication.

cytoraId.description: The unqiue identifier used in Cytora. It's also used to provide a link to the submission in Cytora.

cytoraUrl.description: The link to the submssion in Cytora.

aimsId.description: UUID from AIMS in order to fetch all documents in File and Dossier.

consistsOfSubmissionGeneralInfo.description: All information sent by Cytora for requests for submissions.

consistsOfLocationInput.description: A list of locations which should be added to a submission via the mass upload functionality.

id.description: Unique ID of the CommunicationItem object.

Complex.title: Complex
Complex.description: Complex is a part of a location that is with respect to fire protection or occupancy guidelines different that the rest of a location

Coverage.title: Coverage
Coverage.declaration: Object containing information about the coverage

label.description: Short human-readable description of the coverage label

CoverageApplicability.title: CoverageApplicability
CoverageApplicability.description: Current Solution to be discussed with Joerg - Used in LC for extensions

causesDamage.description: Damage caused by the coverage extension

sourceCurrency.description: Source currency for the exchange rate

exchangeRateDivider.description: Exchange rate divider used to convert source currency to target currency

partyId.description: This is a unique key provided by the creator of the party instance

name.description: The official name of the legal entity

legalName.description: The official name of the legal entity

legalForm.description: The official name of the legal entity

legalParentPartyId.description: Follow legal structure, allow from branch substructure to go up to legal structure

financialRisk.description: Defines the financial risk e.g. low, medium, high. to be defined per oe, therefore reference data

overallCheckStatus.description: Represents an interpretation of UW Checks for client result

numberOfEmployees.description: The number of employees employeed with this customer.

turnover.description: The number of employees employeed with this company.

clientSegmentation.description: Segmentation of the client based on various criteria

financialRisk.description: Assessment of the client's financial risk

Damage.title: Damage
Damage.declaration: Object containing information about the damage

oneOf.description: Lists the Benefits that would arise in case of damage would be relevant in case.

definedBy.description: this object holds the list of damages covered. It will have the damage  descripted with name and label.

damageToAnyEntity.description: Points basically to a LocationRuleId(anyEntityRef) which holds the list of insured-objects. EntityRef is an object which holds the primary key of AnyEntity object. The AnyEntity object eventually contains list of insured-objects

type.description: Specifies the type of deductible based on defined values

valueType.description: Specififes the value type of the deductible

items.description: We modelled this to accommodate the possibility to send the amount in multiple currencies in parallel.

appliesToComponent.description: Component of the InsurableEntity to which the limit applies (e.g., building, content, stocks)

retentionType.description: Type of retention (e.g., standard-deductible, excess, franchise)

DefinedBy.title: DefinedBy
DefinedBy.description: this object holds the list of damages covered. It will have the damage  descripted with name and label.

label.description: It is the label for the damage. Example values - PD

name.description: It is the CFM technical name of the damage Example values - 'property-damage'

deductionType.description: Identifier for the type of deduction (e.g., broker-commission, premium-tax, lead-fee)

bookingCode.description: Identifies the booking type of the deduction (e.g., tax, com, fee)

revenueCode.description: Code from Global Genius to indicate the account the tax is linked to

deductionCase.description: FRED code linked to the tax - not currently implemented - tax only

deductionCode.description: Type of deduction (e.g., lead-fee, arc-fee, cost-of-capital-fee)

deductionDescription.description: Name of the deductionCode held in deduction table or tax table

state.description: State linked to the tax where applicable (e.g., Swiss Cantons - tax only)

municipality.description: Municipality linked to the tax where applicable (e.g., London - tax only)

taxApplicableZipCodes.description: List of zip codes where tax is applicable

deductionPayableBy.description: Entity responsible for paying the deduction

applicableToSection.description: Reporting section the deduction is applied to (e.g., PD, BI)

reportingSection.description: List of reporting sections specific to the deductionCode from the tax table (e.g., PD - tax only)

taxStartDate.description: Date the tax is valid from - tax only

taxEndDate.description: Date the tax is valid to - tax only

premiumAffected.description: Premium affected by the deduction (gross-premium, net-premium, not-applicable)

isIncludedInPremium.description: Indicates if the deduction is included in the premium

leadTime.description: Lead time for delay in start-up

territory.description: Territory related to the delay in start-up

delayInStartUpFloatPeriodPr.description: Float period percentage for delay in start-up

planIrregularity.description: Irregularity in the plan of the building

softStory.description: Presence of a soft story in the building structure

structuralUpgrade.description: Details on structural upgrades for earthquake resistance

constructionQuality.description: Quality of construction regarding earthquake resistance

tank.description: Details about tanks and their earthquake resistance

sprinklerType.description: Type of sprinkler system in place

specialEarthquakeResistiveSystems.description: Special systems in place for earthquake resistance

buildingExteriorOpening.description: Details about exterior openings in the building

shortColumn.description: Presence of short columns in the structure

exteriorWallsOrCladding.description: Type of exterior walls or cladding used

appendagesAndOrnamentation.description: Details about appendages and ornamentation on the building

crippleWalls.description: Details about cripple walls and their earthquake resistance

equipmentSupportMaintenance.description: Maintenance of equipment support for earthquake resistance

frameBoltedToFoundation.description: Details about frame bolting to foundation

residentialGrade.description: Grade of residential construction for earthquake resistance

tiltUpRetrofit.description: Details about tilt-up retrofit for earthquake resistance

urmRetrofit.description: Details about URM retrofit for earthquake resistance

verticalIrregularity.description: Vertical irregularity in the building structure

completionDate.description: Completion date of earthquake protection measures. Format - YYYY-MM-DD

startDate.description: Start date of earthquake protection measures. Format - YYYY-MM-DD

yearUpgraded.description: Year when earthquake protection measures were upgraded

assessmentId.description: Every assessment does need a unique id

insurableEntityRef.description: Every assessment needs to point to an insurable entity

versionId.description: The version of the assessment as assigned by the owning process

owningProcess.description: The name of the business process maintaining this assessment

assessmentDate.description: The date and time when the assessment was made

isCurrent.description: Flag to simplify reference to the newest assessment

label.description: Label for the entity

Entity.title: Entity
Entity.description: Definition of an Insurable Entity (CFM Object Entity)

entityID.description: Self key - should be decomissioned longterm?! discussions maybe required based on AnyEntity - sim,ilar behavior

label.description: Predefined name from BE or user defined name

lastUpdatedBy.description: User who created or changed the entity information (e.g. Benzl)

lastUpdatedDate.description: Date and time of last change by user

identifiedByUniqueData.description: Every insurable entity needs a unique data section. It refers to UniqueData object

items.description: TSI, market value, repalcement value, ...
e.g. ISIC and weight
e.g. Wording and Clauses
e.g. Desktop Risk Assessment

caseID.description: Foreign key of the Case # to be decimmissioned

Event.title: Event
Event.description: Object containing information about an event

label.description: Short human-readable description of the event

definedBy.description: <EventData> List of Events. Its an array

label.description: label of the covered event

toTargetCurrencyExchangeRate.description: List of exchange rates to the target currency

facRiSegmentId.description: Identifier for the facultative reinsurance segment

facRiSegmentDescription.description: Description of the facultative reinsurance segment

riProcessingOrder.description: Processing order for reinsurance (e.g., 1, 2, 3, ...). Number must be set and reordered if segments change

items.description: List of coverages that are reinsured if they match

sharingRiskFromPolicy.description: Optional field indicating sharing risk from policy

items.description: List of coverage segments defined by facultative reinsurance
List of layers reinsured by facultative reinsurance

facRiLayerId.description: UUID of the layer, globally unique

facRiSegmentLayerId.description: Reference to the segment layer ID defined by cover

coverDefinedBySegmentRef.description: Reference to the cover defined by segment

facRiLayerNr.description: Layer number (e.g., 1a, 2a, 2b, ...). If proportional, only one RI layer is possible

facRiLayerType.description: Type of the layer (e.g., proportional, non-proportional)

facRiLayerDescription.description: Description of the facultative reinsurance layer

items.description: List of reinsurance placements written by the layer

contentGrade.description: Grade of content with respect to flood exposure

flashingAndCopingQuality.description: Quality of flashing and coping against floods

ifmVerticalExposureDistribution.description: Vertical exposure distribution for flood modifiers

contentsVulnerabilityDueToWater.description: Vulnerability of contents due to water exposure

floodDefenseElevationUnit.description: Unit of measurement for flood defense elevation

frameFoundationConnection.description: Connection type of frame foundation (unknown, bolted, unbolted, engineered)

floodDuration.description: Duration of flood exposure (unknown, short, long)

floodSalvagePotential.description: Salvage potential in case of flood (lowest, low, average, high, very-high)

waterproofPackaging.description: Quality of waterproof packaging (unknown, deficient, standard, superior)

marineFloodProtection.description: Marine flood protection level (unknown, none, slightly-protected)

specieStorageFlood.description: Flood protection for specie storage (unknown, window, outside-vault)

completionDate.description: Completion date of flood protection measures. Format - YYYY-MM-DD

startDate.description: Start date of flood protection measures. Format - YYYY-MM-DD

yearUpgraded.description: Year when flood protection measures were upgraded

velocity.description: The Velocity modifier is an essential component in CAT modelling for flood peril, providing critical insights into the speed and intensity of water flow during flood events. This modifier is defined by measuring the rate at which floodwaters move across different terrains and through various channels, impacting the severity and potential damage caused by flooding.The Velocity modifier is a vital tool in CAT modelling for flood peril, enhancing the ability to predict, assess, and manage flood-related risks effectively

FixedPriority.title: FixedPriority
FixedPriority.description: Priority of submissions as a fixes (enum defined) value.

value.description: Based on the suggested TSI and Occupancy a certain priority is calculated and handed over to the UWWB.

codeAOC.description: AOC code associated with the location.

nrcCodeAOC.description: NRC AOC code related to the location.

type.description: RZ = Risk Zone, DIST = Distance - category of data

label.description: Label of the hierarchy identifier

historicalExposureId.description: Local number, not a UUID. For example, E0000001

exposureAmount.description: Financial amount related to the exposure

individualClaimsId.description: Local number, not a UUID (e.g., CL000001)

Installments.title: Installments
Installments.description: Object containing information about the installments

Id.description: ID of the Installment. installmentId in Handover

installmentType.description: Used to distinguish first installment and subsequent installments (NP) which are following different legal requirements

installmentIntervalEndDate.description: End date of the installment period

InstallmentPlan.description: Object containing information about the installment plan

contractVersion.description: The part of the policy number changing with an MTC

Insurance.title: Insurance
Insurance.description: Object containing information about the insurance

lineOfBusiness.description: Line of business of this insurance package.

subLineOfBusiness.description: This attribute is used in LC for identifying subline of business of this insurance package

product.description: To specify the product of the promised insurance. Might include offering if applicable

isAggregateLimitErodedByDeductible.description: This signifies whether fees erode the Annual Aggregate Limit or not

isAggregateLimitErodedByFee.description: This signifies whether deductibles erode the Annual Aggregate Limit or not

option.description: In case of multiple options per insurance package

type.description: Type of insurable entity, partially expressed by subclass in Java, but can be more detailed

name.description: Technical name of the insurable entity derived from the label

label.description: Printable label for the user to recognize

identifiedByUniqueData.description: Unique data section for every insurable entity

locatedAtStandardAddress.description: Registered address for the insurable entity, even for ships and planes

InsurableEntityRelation.title: InsurableEntityRelation
InsurableEntityRelation.description: Details of an insurable entity relation

relationId.description: Unique ID of the relation object, globally unique

relationType.description: Type of relation from a predefined list

from.description: Multiple sources of the directed relation

myto.description: Multiple targets of the directed relation

fromType.description: Hierarchic type of the source insurable entities

submissionBaseNr.description: Versioning reference to the submission capturing the relation

versionId.description: Version ID, following a version schema similar to assessments

assessmentDate.description: Date when the relation was captured or updated

Item.title: Item
Item.description: Describes the content of a Building where specifically categorizable

id.description: The unique identifier of the intermediary.

contactName.description: In case of a big agency, a contact name to one specific borker could be stored here.

email.description: The email address of the intermediary.

invoiceIssueDate.description: Date when the SOE has issued the local policy invoice to the local Insured

premiumPaymentDueDate.description: Date when the premium of the local Insured is due

premiumCollectedDate.description: Date when the SOE has collected the premium from the local Insured

LeadInsuranceFee.title: LeadInsuranceFee
LeadInsuranceFee.description: Stores the perventage and the amount for the lead insurance fee that applies for the panel

leadFeePr.description: Between 0 and 1 - in case a percentage value describes the LeadInsuranceFee

resultsInAmount.description: Between 0 and 1 - in case a value in a dedicatede currency describes the LeadInsuranceFee

type.description: Specifies the type of Limit/Deductible based on defined values

valueType.description: 'Specififes the value type of the limit.

items.description: We modelled this to accommodate the possibility to send the amount in multiple currencies in parallel.

oneOf.description: It is used when we select duration -'days' ,'weeks','months'

appliesToComponent.description: Few possible values are building, content, stocks [Defines to which component of the InsurableEntity the limit applies to]

coverType.description: Its BI cover type. e.g. gross-profits coverType applicable to bi-indemnity-period limit type. In case of measurement of type week,days,months

maxAmount.description: minimum limits in case of percentage limits (similar to min/max deductibles)

minAmount.description: minimum limits in case of percentage limits (similar to min/max deductibles)

percentage.description: (Percentage) It is used when we select limit/deductible input in terms of % of TSI or % of Loss

LossEvent.title: LossEvent
LossEvent.description: Object containing information about the loss event

notifiedOn.description: Exact datetime including time zone information indicating when the loss event was reported to the insurer, serving as a critical timestamp for tracking the claims process timeline and ensuring timely response and resolution.

reportedWithCase.description: Links a claim to the specific coverage in relevant insurance. This ensures that the claim is evaluated and processed based on the correct terms and conditions, helping to determine the extent of coverage, limits, exclusions, and any other relevant factors that influence the claim's outcome. It is essential for verifying eligibility and ensuring accurate handling of the claim.

Location.title: Location
Location.description: Location is the physical insured property that is characterized by having his own address

additionalInfo.description: Allows the UW to capture additional information for a location. In this case the desired coverages can be named.

LocationInput.title: LocationInput
LocationInput.description: A list of locations which should be imported.

floatingBI.description: The relevant floating BI value, which needs to be proportionally distributed.

indemnityLimitPOL.description: The indemnity limit for the Property Owners Liability section.

items.description: Allows the UW to capture additional information for a location. In this case the desired coverages can be named.

LocationEntity.title: LocationEntity
LocationEntity.description: Subclass of InsurableEntity representing a location entity

maxOutputInRelationToNormalDemand.description: Maximum output in relation to normal demand

numberOFMachinesWorkingInParallel.description: Number of machines working in parallel

items.description: List of local direct policies extended by the international master policy
List of reinsurance policies assumed by the international master policy for local direct policies

Measurement.title: Measurement
Measurement.description: Object containing information about the measurement when the vale type selected is duration

value.description: Numeric value refering to the unit

MigratedEntityAspect.title: MigratedEntityAspect
MigratedEntityAspect.description: Details of a migrated entity aspect

aspectContext.description: Context of the aspect (e.g., technical, business)

submissionBaseNrRef.description: Reference for the submission base number

lastUpdatedDate.description: Date and time of the last update

Note.title: Note
Note.description: This entity allows handlers to document important information, updates, and decisions related to a claim.

name.description: Notes are categorized based on the notes description and this field indicate a short code for each category. This ensures notes are systematically organized and easily searchable.

label.description: This indicates the detailed text for the Notes category.

description.description: This is used to elaborate on the context, updates, and decisions related to a claim, ensuring comprehensive documentation.

createdOn.description: The date and time when a note is entered into the system.

author.description: This identifies the user who has actually created the note.

Occupancy.title: Occupancy
Occupancy.description: Occupancy is the Area of work something is insured or some Customer works for

notation.description: Determines whether the standardized ISIC or the locally customized local code is used.

notationCountry.description: Defines the ISO 2 country code for which the code is valid, e.g. DE for Germany or NULL for global.

label.description: The long text(label) for the code.

OccupancyAssessment.title: OccupancyAssessment
OccupancyAssessment.description: Parent for Occupancy and it's Share if multiple Occupancy are existing

source.description: UW input (e.g. manual), system comprehensive (e.g. system), user comprehensive (e.g. user)

description.description: Field for additional infos or reasoning.

primary.description: A flag to show which Occupancy is the primary Occupancy.

removalOfWreckOrDebrisRiskGrading.description: Risk grading for removal of wreck or debris

location.description: Location of the offshore wind project

ageOfPlantYr.description: Age of the plant in years

defectivePartBuybackRiskGrading.description: Risk grading for defective part buyback

damageToExistingPropertyExclConsequentia.description: Risk grading for damage to existing property excluding consequential loss

damageToExistingPropertyInclConsequentia.description: Risk grading for damage to existing property including consequential loss

offshorePipelineLengthKm.description: Length of offshore pipeline in kilometers

offshorePipelineDiameterIn.description: Diameter of offshore pipeline in inches

offshoreWaterDepthFt.description: Water depth for offshore construction in feet

Organization.title: Organization
Organization.description: Object containing information about the Organization

agcsOeText.description: Text description of AGCS organizational entity

agcsOeLongText.description: Long text description of AGCS organizational entity

region.description: Region identifier, e.g., AGCS Iberia or LC Iberia

writingCompanyPartyId.description: Party ID of the writing company, e.g., BE55, AT55

writingCompanyName.description: Name of the writing company, e.g., AGCS Spain Branch

legalEntityPartyId.description: Party ID of the legal entity holding company, e.g., DE0055

srccRiskGrading.description: SRCC (Strikes, Riots, and Civil Commotion) risk grading

theftBurglaryMaliciousDamageRiskGrading.description: Risk grading for theft, burglary, and malicious damage

professionalFeesExpeditingExpensesRiskGr.description: Risk grading for professional fees and expediting expenses

propertyInOffSiteStorageRiskGrading.description: Risk grading for property in off-site storage

additionalCostOfConstructionRiskGrading.description: Risk grading for additional cost of construction

increasedCostOfWorkingRiskGrading.description: Increased cost of working risk grading

hullRiskMobileMachineryTransitExclRiskGr.description: Hull risk mobile machinery transit excluding risk grading

hullRiskMobileMachineryTransitInclRiskGr.description: Hull risk mobile machinery transit including risk grading

projectTypeTPL.description: Type of the project for Third Party Liability

dependencyMLoP.description: Dependency on Machinery Loss of Profit

Parameter.title: Parameter
Parameter.description: Details of a parameter used in selection

value.description: List of values associated with the parameter

draftPartyId.description: Temporary key for the requesting system

legalParentPartyRef.description: Follow legal structure, allow from branch substructure to go up to legal structure

ultimateParentPartyRef.description: This is the ID of the legal ultimate parent

commercialInterestPartyRef.description: Referring to all parties having a commercial interest in this facility

allianzBranchMotherId.description: Identifier of the Allianz legal entity of the branch

value.description: Flags wheter a quote recommendation is given.

PercentagePriority.title: PercentagePriority
PercentagePriority.description: Priority of submissions as a percentage value.

percentage.description: Based on the suggested TSI and Occupancy a certain priority is calculated and handed over to the UWWB (in numeric format)

Period.title: Period
Period.description: Describing dates and time periods for a policy

inceptionDate.description: The start date of the policy validity period.

expiryDate.description: The end date of the policy validity period.

source.description: origin of data e.g. GeoCoding or User

Policy.title: Policy
Policy.description: Object containing information about the policy

policyCurrency.description: The currency defined for the policy. Format in the 3 character format from ISO 4217.

policyType.description: Specifies the type of the policy.

contractNumber.description: Contract number composed of baseNr, underwritingYear, and renewalNr

contractVersion.description: Version of the contract indicating mid-term change number

createdFrom.description: Previous policyId indicating the origin in case of MTC, renewal, or cancel

validInPeriod.description: Period during which the policy is valid

inWorkflowProcessing.description: Workflow processing capability for agree, book, book-expected-values

items.description: List of insurances promised by the policy

installmentId.description: Unique ID assigned to the installment by the UWWB

installmentType.description: Type of installment used to distinguish first installment (EP) and subsequent installments (NP)

installmentIntervalStartDate.description: Start date of the booking period

installmentIntervalEndDate.description: End date of the booking period

sharePr.description: Percentage share allocation based on payment frequency

inceptionDate.description: Date of inception for the policy

expiryDate.description: Date of expiry for the policy

mtcEffectiveDate.description: Effective date for MTC changes, indicating start date for changes and cancellations

policyStartEndTimeScheme.description: Scheme for policy start and end time (e.g., noon, midnight)

name.description: Name of the pool reinsurance (e.g., gareat)

label.description: Label for the pool reinsurance (e.g., GARET, CATNAT)

PostalAddress.title: PostalAddress
PostalAddress.description: Object that specifies one of three possible address: StructuredAddress, UnstructuredAddress or ExtractedAddress

actingAs.description: Role of the PremiumSource (e.g., client, broker, lead-carrier, cedant)

PricingLine.title: PricingLine
PricingLine.description: Object containing information about the pricing line

expectedLoss100PrValue.description: Expected loss of the case for 100% share based on exposure

experienceAdjustmentPr.description: Factor to adjust the exposure based expected loss to consider the loss experience

expectedLossExperienceAdjusted100PrValue.description: Expected loss of the case for 100% share based on exposure and experience

expectedLossBlended100PrValue.description: Weighted value between expectedLoss100PrValue and expectedLossExperienceAdjusted100PrValue.

caseId.description: ID of the case priced / rated

caseLabel.description: Functional key of case (e.g. peril / extension)

termActualPremium.description: 12 months equivalent of the actual premium

termTpPremium.description: 12 months equivalent of the technical premium

termTapPremium.description: 12 months equivalent of the target premium

modelExpectedLossMainPeril.description: Model expected loss of a case, contains the peril expected loss only

technicalExpectedLossMainPeril.description: Technical expected loss of a case, contains the peril expected loss only

technicalExpectedLoss.description: Technical expected loss of a case, contains the peril + the allocated extension expected loss

modelExpectedLoss.description: Model expected loss of a case, contains the peril + the allocated extension expected loss

lineOfBusiness.description: Line of business associated with the product

subLineOfBusiness.description: Sub-line of business associated with the product

businessWorkflow.description: Business workflow associated with the product

defaultLimitConfiguration.description: Default limit configuration for the product

defaultDeductibleConfiguration.description: Default deductible configuration for the product

createdOn.description: Date and time when the product was created

updatedBy.description: User who last updated the product

updatedOn.description: Date and time when the product was last updated

offersCoverage.description: List of coverages offered by the product

PricingRequest.title: PricingRequest
PricingRequest.description: Signal that a pricing is required - when no pricing lines are attached and also a container for the pricing lines who are associated to a case

requestDate.description: Since when new pricing is required also gives the information of the order with respect to the past fpr the pricing request e.g. relevant for AP/TP calculations or similar processes

lastUpdatedDate.description: Response or update dependend (AP change or UW AP adoptions)

isCurrent.description: Is used to identify which pricing request belongs to the current set of product definitions

asOfDate.description: This date describes which rating model is selected for rating - the date says that the model should be selected which was valid on this date on radar side

constructionType.description: Type of construction for the building.

yearBuilt.description: The year the building was constructed.

yearUpgraded.description: The year the building was last upgraded.

numberOfBuildings.description: Total number of buildings in the location.

numberOfStories.description: Total number of stories in the building.

buildingHeightUnit.description: Unit of measurement for the building height.

numberFloorsAboveGround.description: Number of floors above ground level.

lowestFloorAboveGround.description: The lowest floor above ground level.

floorArea.description: Total floor area of the building.

floorAreaUnit.description: Unit of measurement for the floor area.

floorOccupancy.description: Type of occupancy for the floor.

sprinklersInstalled.description: Indicates whether sprinklers are installed: no, yes, unknown.

quoteRecommendation.description: Flags wheter a quote recommendation is given.

Program.title: Program
Program.description: Object containing information about the program

id.description: Program ID with renewal number, e.g. DE02000001.1

ourShareTotalCapacityAmount.description: Our share of total capacity amount

ourShareTotalCapacityAfterFacRIAmount.description: Our share of total capacity after facultative reinsurance amount

ourShareTotalParticipationPr.description: Our share of total participation percentage

ourShareTotalParticipationAfterFacRIPr.description: Our share of total participation after facultative reinsurance percentage

erectionPhaseStartDate.description: Start date of the erection phase. Format - YYYY-MM-DD

erectionPhaseEndDate.description: End date of the erection phase. Format - YYYY-MM-DD

silentPhaseStartDate.description: Start date of the silent phase. Format - YYYY-MM-DD

silentPhaseEndDate.description: End date of the silent phase. Format - YYYY-MM-DD

testingPhaseStartDate.description: Start date of the testing phase. Format - YYYY-MM-DD

testingPhaseEndDate.description: End date of the testing phase. Format - YYYY-MM-DD

maintenancePhaseStartDate.description: Start date of the maintenance phase. Format - YYYY-MM-DD

maintenancePhaseEndDate.description: End date of the maintenance phase. Format - YYYY-MM-DD

Question.title: Question
Question.description: A question which is part of an assessment.

name.description: The question name, which acts as the functional key.

label.description: The question label, which gives the human readable text.

Quote.title: Quote
Quote.description: Object containing information about the quote

id.description: Human readable and unique id of this quote also holding post fix information regarding version and mta + renewals

answeringToSubmission.description: The relation to the submission the quote is created for

isMainAlternative.description: set to true for quote alternative declared as main in pre-bound state. Bound state implies true

activityDescription.description: A free-text description for the main activities handled under this quote.

source.description: BE process or user decision that made the attached process necessary

reason.description: The reasoning why it was required e.g. case updated, change of geo coordinates

decision.description: Flags wheter a quote recommendation is given.

source.description: BE process or user decision that made the attached process necessary

reason.description: The reasoning why it was required e.g. case updated, change of geo coordinates

recommendationNumber.description: Recommendation number used as ref in LC360

recommendationPriority.description: Priority of the recommendation: high, important, or advisory

dueDate.description: Due date of the recommendation. Format - YYYY-MM-DD

probabilityOfCompliance.description: ARC estimate of the probability of implementing the recommendation. e.g. 0.85

recommendationType.description: Type of recommendation: human-element, physical, or others

recommendationCategory.description: Different types of recommendation categories based on LOB

recommendationLevel.description: Level of recommendation: account or location

recommendationStatus.description: Status of the recommendation (not specific to systems)

recommendationCompletedDate.description: Date on which recommendation was implemented. Format - YYYY-MM-DD

sourceOfRecommendation.description: Source from where the recommendation was triggered (survey, document etc.)

recommendationCauseofLoss.description: Information about the reason for the potential loss

valueType.description: Type of value (e.g., amount, percentage, not-applicable)

premiumAffected.description: Type of premium affected (e.g., gross-premium, net-premium, not-applicable)

commissionType.description: Type of commission (e.g., insurer, broker, reinsurer)

Reference.title: Reference
Reference.description: Shows in which context the policy was created (e.g. Claim or any other postprocessing will not have a direct linkage)

Reserve.title: Reserve
Reserve.description: Object containing information about the reserve

withProportionalReserve.description: This field is relevant for coinsurance cases. If it is a non coinsurance case, this attribute will be blank. This details the distribution of the reserve among insurers in case of coinsurance. Each entry in the array corresponds to an insurer's share, capturing both the coinsurance participation and the calculated share amount. This ensures clarity in how the reserve is proportionally allocated across multiple insurers.

amount.description: This field indicates the total reserve set aside.

ReserveShare.title: ReserveShare
ReserveShare.description: Object containing information about the reserve share

basedOnAgreedCoInsuranceParticipation.description: This field contains the details of the coinsurers along with the percentage or proportion of the risk that each insurer is responsible for in the coinsurance agreement. It reflects each insurer's participation level in covering the claim.

calculatedAmount.description: This field specifies the actual monetary amount of the reserve that corresponds to each insurer's participation level. It is calculated based on the overall reserve and the coinsurance participation percentage.

placedWithReinsurer.description: Reinsurer with whom the placement is made

viaRiBroker.description: Broker through whom the placement is made

reinsuranceCommission.description: Reinsurance commission (to be deprecated in future)

items.description: List of reinsurance commissions
List of split premiums for reinsurance
List of split premiums calculated from reinsurance
List of policies backed by the reinsurance policy, including direct or other reinsurance policies

RiskAssessment.title: RiskAssessment
RiskAssessment.description: Parent for results of an LCE Survey

riskAssessmentForeignKey.description: Foreign Key of Risk Assement System

Role.title: Role
Role.description: Describes the role that an entiy has in a specific context

restrictedTo.description: Here the reference to the object is defined -- to be decomissioned

label.description: Human readable

spartaOrgUnitId.description: Sparta organizational unit ID (3 digit number)

name.description: Name of the sales unit (e.g., AON Mid market London)

locatedAtAddress.description: Address where the sales unit is located

isOwnerOfSalesAccount.description: List of sales accounts owned by this sales unit

items.description: List of parameters associated with the selection

label.description: Human readable

limitType.description: Type of limit (e.g., amount, percent-of-tsi, percent-of-loss)

deductibleType.description: Type of deductible (e.g., amount, percent-of-tsi, percent-of-loss)

biIndemnityPeriodMonth.description: Business interruption indemnity period in months

Score.title: Score
Score.description: A result of an LCE Survey

score.description: The risk score, taken form the survey report provided by the LCE Engineer

type.description: The Typ of risk for which the risk score was determined

Share.title: Share
Share.description: Share represents the size of an element's contribution to the total set of the same elements

value.description: The file url for the entity which was outsourced to the S3 bucket.

premiumType.description: Type of premium (e.g., after-discount, after-special-captive-rate, gross, net)

StructuredAddress.title: StructuredAddress
StructuredAddress.description: Object containing information about structured address

zipCode.description: To specify the zip code on a structure address

addressStatus.description: To specify the status of an address

Submission.title: Submission
Submission.description: Object containing information about the submission

id.description: Human readable and unique id of this submission + version information suffix

identifiedBy.description: This manages versioning information of submission, quote and policy Concept - Numbering Scheme - Submission, Quote, & Policy.

basedOnCommunication.description: When a submission is newly created and based on a communication, the communicationId is sent here.

SubmissionGeneralInfo.title: SubmissionGeneralInfo
SubmissionGeneralInfo.description: General information which is used to create a submission.

inceptionDate.description: Date when the quoted insurance goes into effect.

expiryDate.description: Expiry date from which the contract between Allianz and customer Ends.

quoteRequiredByDate.description: The date until when the new quote should be created.

salesOffering.description: The selected sales offering provided from a pre-defined list (via reference data).

product.description: This shows which product was selected and which offering if applicable (e.g. broker product)

items.description: One specific extension

belongsToOrganisation.description: The tenant to which this entry belongs to.

holdingInsurer.description: The insurer the client is currently insured with.

targetPremium.description: The intermediary offers a target premium at the time of a quote request and the underwriter tries to achieve it to get the business.

policyMigration.description: Defines whether the newly created submission should be migrated from a legacy system.

forCustomer.description: The client which requested the submission.

mediatedByIntermediary.description: The intermediary which should earn the commission for the requested submission.

handeledByUnderwriter.description: The underwriter responsible for the requested submission.

submissionReceivedOnDate.description: Date when the submission was received

industryVerticalText.description: Text description of the industry vertical

industryVerticalLongText.description: Long text description of the industry vertical

businessWorkflow.description: Business workflow (e.g., operational-cover, upstream-operational-cover, single-project, open-cover-declaration, open-cover-turnover)

productText.description: Product text (optional field, will be dropped in higher CFM version)

productLongText.description: Product long text (optional field, will be dropped in higher CFM version)

createdOn.description: Date and time when the submission was created

updatedOn.description: Date and time when the submission was last updated

updatedBy.description: User who last updated the submission

policyStartEndTimeScheme.description: Policy start and end time scheme (e.g., noon or midnight)

codeISICText.description: Text description of the ISIC code

codeISICLongText.description: Long text description of the ISIC code

codeISICPlusText.description: Text description of the ISIC Plus code

codeAOCText.description: Text description of the AOC code

Tax.title: Tax
Tax.description: Container for all taxes associated to one case

value.description: The sum of all taxes for case

taxCaseId.description: Identifer of the tax cases used in the calculation as base (percentage or amount as described in tax case)

TaxCase.title: TaxCase
TaxCase.description: The cases that are associated to a coverage and build tha base for operative tax calculation - probably not used in operative kafka communication

label.description: Human readable

taxPoint.description: Standard coding accodring to countries e.g. taxPoint

oe.description: Seperation according to country by ISO2 code

priority.description: Supposed to be used in determination of calculation order during actual of tax amount calculation

type.description: e.g. VAT, regional, ... depends on OE requirements

Template.title: Template
Template.description: Provides a coverage or isurance that can be applied in scenarios like inheriatnce/presetting/product offer

label.description: Human readable name e.g. product offering name

TextualAgreement.title: TextualAgreement
TextualAgreement.description: This entitiy holds text fragmanets that define the coverage -> replaces / generalizes Individual Agreement

title.description: Title of the predefined or free text if not predefined

origin.description: Gives relevant info where the text came from

category.description: Kind of text added for printing / contract Agreement

text.description: Resulting text from UW input, predefined input copied or predefined input copied along with the input of UW (e.g.)

projectTypeTPL.description: Type of the project for Third Party Liability

tunnelAndUndergroundWorks.description: Details about tunnel and underground works

isWorkOver10Meters.description: Indicates if work is over 10 meters

hazardousExposuresOnConstructionSite.description: Hazardous exposures on the construction site

isPartialHandover.description: Indicates if there is a partial handover

isPublicAccessDuringWorks.description: Indicates if there is public access during works

loweringGroundWaterTableOrWaterDiversion.description: Details about lowering groundwater table or water diversion

isSecondaryCover.description: Indicates if secondary cover is included

isRestrictionToOwnerOrPrincipleOnly.description: Indicates if restriction is to owner or principle only

isCrossLiabilityRequired.description: Indicates if cross liability is required

isUK2121ClauseIncluded.description: Indicates if UK 2121 clause is included

isUKContractualLiabilityIncluded.description: Indicates if UK contractual liability is included

isSpainEmployersLiabilityIncluded.description: Indicates if Spain employers liability is included

Trigger.title: Trigger
Trigger.declaration: Object containing information about the trigger

overallCheckStatus.description: Status of overall checks (e.g., incomplete, non-compliant, compliant, expired). isCleared = (overallCheckStatus == compliant)

sanctionCheckStatus.description: Status of sanction checks (e.g., incomplete, non-compliant, compliant, expired)

reputationCheckStatus.description: Status of reputation checks (e.g., incomplete, non-compliant, compliant, expired)

rationale.description: Rationale for the checks. This is still under discussion and subject to change in higher CFM versions

evaluationDate.description: Date of evaluation. This is still under discussion and subject to change in higher CFM versions

Underwriter.title: Underwriter
Underwriter.description: Object containing information about the underwriter

userId.description: Unique user id of the underwriter identifying as employee.

email.description: Email of the underwriter used in application such as CWB.

UniqueData.title: UniqueData
UniqueData.description: Object containing information about the unique data

reportingId.description: Allows to send an alternative Id for reporting in case primary key is not suitable in a E2E Business case.

ucvId.description: Unique identifier for partners assigned by Unique Customer View (UCV) application

spartaId.description: Unique identifier for intermediaries by Sparta application

legacyClaim.description: Provides a link to a legacy system where the claim was previously processed

items.title: LegacyClaim
items.description: Provides a link to a legacy system where the claim was previously processed

system.description: The legacy system from which a claim needs to be migrated from

number.description: The claim number of the legacy system

legacyLossId.description: Provides a link to a legacy system where the loss event was previously created and processed

items.title: legacyLossId
items.description: Provides a link to a legacy system where the loss event was previously created and processed

system.description: The legacy system from which a loss needs to be migrated from

number.description: The loss number of the legacy system

policyId.description: This id represents the policy this entity is proposed for if there is a 1:1 realtion between policy and the group

insurableEntityId.description: Unique functional key within entity vertical MC does not use it here only LC

ABSPartnerId.description: Gives the AnyEntity a Policy Context

mdmId.description: The foreign key of a party from MDM.

companyRegisterNumber.description: The unique company register number, uniquely identifying a company within a country.

intakeId.description: This id is either the UUID created by the Intake domain or reused from Cytora to be able to link the locations upon multiple imports.

valueCode.description: Code used by inner logic of AnyEntity - mapping of the entity type

system.description: LegacyPolicy provides a link to a legacy system where the policy originates from. system: The legacy system from which a policy needs to be migrated from, e.g. 'ABS-D'

number.description: LegacyPolicy provides a link to a legacy system where the policy originates from. number: The policy number of a legacy system. Only applicable whenever the submissionMigration flag is set to true, e.g. A80312312123

sourceId.description: The id of the scource object in case of creation in case of copy or MTA #RG: Too unspecific. What source object does this refer too? Consider more explicit name, e.g. 'source_policy_id'

uniquePropertyReferenceNumber.description: Unique code for a property in UK

tradeRegisterNr.description: in Germany the handelsregisternummer example HRB 103416 50939, in GB company registration number

corporateTaxId.description: TAX Identification Number (FEIN ID for US domestic companies, ALIEN ID for non-US/foreign companies)

socialSecurityNumber.description: Social Security Number (used in the US)

dunsNr.description: Unique numeric identifier for companies assigned by Dun & Bradstreet

UnstructuredAddress.title: UnstructuredAddress
UnstructuredAddress.description: Object containing information about unstructured address

performed.description: Gives info if the check was done

compliant.description: Gives info if checks were positive

rationale.description: Free text field for rationale if required

UWJudgement.title: UWJudgement
UWJudgement.description: UWJugdement represents a discount / surcharge per case and is valid for the entire location

caseLabel.description: Gives the functional key of the effected case (Peril / extension / ... )

discountSurcharge.description: Number smaller than 1 refer to a discount (e.g. 0.9 being a 10% discount) while number bigger than 1 reflect a surcharge (e.g. 1.1 being a 10% surcharge)

rational.description: UWs argument for the discount or surcharge

Value.title: Value
Value.description: The value bears the insured sum, which can be determined in different ways.

type.description: Value type see example below - which are relevant will be steered by product definition / ref data - for now this

items.description: A value taken into account

validFromDate.description: Date from which the validity period starts

validToDate.description: Date until which the validity period is applicable

Version.title: Version
Version.description: Object containing information about the version on submission, quote, policy and program

renewalNr.description: A postfix that starts with 1 and is increased with each renewal, after '9' continue with '10'

midTermChangeNr.description: This postfix starts with 0 and increases with every MTA of the Submission within a renewal.

quoteAlternative.description: Use for quote, program and policy.

VersionIdentification.title: VersionIdentification
VersionIdentification.description: Object containing information about the version identification submission, quote, policy and program

baseNr.declaration: Base number according to concept 'Numering Scheme - Submission, Quote & Policy'. (https://cmp.allianz.net/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=1404778861)

version.description: This manages versioning information of submission, quote and policy Concept - Numbering Scheme - Submission, Quote, & Policy.

baseNr.description: Version description for program, e.g. DE02000001

ifmStructureCondition.description: Condition of the structure for windstorm modifiers

contentsVulnerabilityDueToWind.description: Vulnerability of contents due to wind exposure

completionDate.description: Completion date of windstorm protection measures. Format - YYYY-MM-DD

startDate.description: Start date of windstorm protection measures. Format - YYYY-MM-DD

yearUpgraded.description: Year when windstorm protection measures were upgraded

mechanicalOrElectricalEquipmentSideOfBui.description: Placement of mechanical or electrical equipment on the side of the building

roofParapetsOrChimneys.description: Details about roof parapets or chimneys

ifmOutdoorMachineryOrEquipmentBracing.description: Bracing for outdoor machinery or equipment

architecturalElements.description: Architectural elements present (unknown, none, canopies, roof-overhang, carports, skylights, skylights-with-covers)

depreciation.description: The Depreciation modifier is a crucial component in CAT modelling for windstorm peril, focusing on the reduction in value of assets and properties over time due to wear and tear, age, and exposure to environmental factors. This modifier evaluates how depreciation affects the vulnerability and potential loss during windstorm events

garaging.description: The Garaging modifier is a significant factor in CAT modelling for windstorm peril, focusing on the protection provided by garages and similar structures to vehicles and other assets during windstorm events. This modifier evaluates the effectiveness of garaging as a protective measure, influencing the potential for damage and loss. The Garaging modifier is essential for refining CAT modelling for windstorm peril, providing valuable insights into damage mitigation and risk assessment related to protective structures

stormproofPackaging.description: The Stormproof Packaging modifier is an important element in CAT modelling for windstorm peril, focusing on the protective measures applied to goods and assets to prevent damage during windstorm events. This modifier evaluates the effectiveness of packaging solutions designed to withstand high winds and debris, thereby reducing potential losses. The Stormproof Packaging modifier is essential for refining CAT modelling for windstorm peril, providing valuable insights into damage prevention and risk assessment related to protective packaging measures

stormSalvagePotential.description: The Storm Salvage Potential modifier is a critical component in CAT modelling for windstorm peril, focusing on the ability to recover and salvage assets and materials following a windstorm event. This modifier evaluates the likelihood and extent to which damaged properties and infrastructure can be restored or repurposed, influencing overall loss estimates and recovery strategies. The Storm Salvage Potential modifier is essential for improving the accuracy and effectiveness of CAT modelling for windstorm peril, providing valuable insights into loss estimation and recovery strategies

treeDensity.description: The Tree Density modifier is a significant factor in CAT modelling for windstorm peril, focusing on the concentration and distribution of trees in a given area. This modifier assesses how tree density influences the impact of windstorms, including potential damage to infrastructure and properties due to falling trees and debris. The Tree Density modifier is essential for refining CAT modelling for windstorm peril, providing valuable insights into risk assessment and mitigation strategies related to tree-related impacts

marineStormProtection.description: The Marine Storm Protection modifier is a crucial element in CAT modelling for windstorm peril, focusing on the measures and structures in place to safeguard marine environments and coastal properties from the impacts of severe windstorms. This modifier evaluates the effectiveness of barriers, breakwaters, and other protective installations designed to mitigate the effects of high winds and storm surges. The Marine Storm Protection modifier is essential for enhancing the accuracy and effectiveness of CAT modelling for windstorm peril, providing valuable insights into risk mitigation and infrastructure resilience

specieStorageHurricane.description: ASPIRE: secondary modifier likely refers to a specific adjustment or factor applied to the risk assessment of assets stored in a particular manner or location that may be affected by hurricanes. As a secondary modifier, it would be used to adjust the primary risk assessment based on specific conditions or characteristics related to the storage of these assets and their vulnerability to hurricanes. This could involve changes in insurance premiums, coverage limits, or other risk management strategies

WorkflowProcessing.title: WorkflowProcessing
WorkflowProcessing.description: Object containing information about the workflow processing

status.description: Describes the current workflow status of the current business object.

transactionDate.description: The date, when the transaction took place.

statusAchievedForReason.title: statusAchievedForReason
statusAchievedForReason.description: Object containing information about the reason of the status achieved.

actor.description: Assigned responsible for the action that changed the status.

description.description: Free text the actor wants to log together with the action that changed the status

reasonName.description: Predefined list of reasons of the status achieved

involvedCompetitor.title: involvedCompetitor
involvedCompetitor.description: Object containing information about the involved competitor

competitorName.description: A string value representing the competitors name

underwritingStatus.description: Describes the status of the undewriting process on submission object granularity and as such, reflects details of the quote alternative that is most advanced for a submission. Allowed values: 'allocated' 'first-contact-call-complete' 'awaiting-information' 'quoted-indicatively' 'quoted' 'declined-by-AZ' 'declined-by-client' 'bound'

code.description: Code as given by ISIC, AOC, etc.

notation.description: Type of notation (e.g., ISICglobal, ISIClocalDE, localDE, AOC, industry-code, NACE, ISIC)

notationVersion.description: Version of the notation (e.g., REVISION_4 version received from UCV)

priority.description: Priority level (e.g., 1, 2, 3 for primary, secondary, etc.)
